descriptor.name: RSS Widget
descriptor.description: The rss widget allows you to display RSS feeds on your dashboard.

rssFeedUrl.label: RSS feed URLs
rssFeedUrl.description: The URLs of the RSS feeds you want to display from.

dangerousAllowSanitizedItemContent.label: Allow HTML formatting (Dangerous)
dangerousAllowSanitizedItemContent.info:
Allowing HTML formatting from outside could be dangerous.
Please make sure that the feed is from a trusted source.

sortPostsWithoutPublishDateToTheTop.label: Put posts without publish date to the top

general.title: Unable to retrieve RSS feed
general.text: There was a problem reaching out the RSS feed. Make sure that you have correctly configured the RSS feed using a valid URL. URLs should match the official specification. After updating the feed, you may need to refresh the dashboard.
